comprehensive_overview: IntaRNA predicts RNA-RNA interactions by taking both target site accessibility and hybridization energies into account, allowing the identification of interaction sites that are not only energetically favorable, but also accessible in the target RNA.
core_features:
1. Prediction of RNA-RNA interactions
2. Consideration of target site accessibility
3. Calculation of hybridization energies
4. Identification of energetically favorable interaction sites
5. Accessibility calculation in target RNA
